mainText:
...Just wanted to write something.

...I receive inspiration from a lot of sources, one of them is the work of people like Steve Jobs.

...I'm an illustrator, every day is a constant search for images that amaze people, that touch people, you guys do that, Steve still does that.

...Thanks a lot for the tools and for the example, for the inspiration, that's a thing that doesn't die.

...My condolences to the family, friends and co-workers.
header: from a little spot in Mexico
author: Sergio
